name: Clone Consumer (Game Jam)
description:
Clone Consumer

A clone of yourself will be spawned every second. Eat your clones before the timer runs out to survive. In other words, consume yourself to SURVIVE.

To move, press WASD or use the arrow keys.

Submission to Dani's Basement Game Jam. (Theme: You are what you consume!)

Please provide honest feedback. If there are any bugs, I don't care.
